description.plain: Jessie Ware is an English singer whose music mixes R&B, hip-hop, pop, soul, and quiet storm. Her debut album, Devotion, came out August 20th, 2012 and was critically acclaimed. Among her influences she lists Sade, Lauryn Hill, and Aaliyah.

body.plain: Jessie Ware is an English singer whose music mixes R&B, hip-hop, pop, soul, and quiet storm. Her debut album, Devotion, came out August 20th, 2012 and was critically acclaimed. Among her influences she lists Sade, Lauryn Hill, and Aaliyah.

songs.full_title: Say You Love Me by Jessie Ware
songs.title: Say You Love Me

description.plain:
“Say You Love Me” is the second single from Jessie Ware’s sophomore album, Tough Love. She collaborated with hit singer and friend Ed Sheeran to write the track.

This song is featured in the alternate ending of the Fifty Shades of Grey film. Another song of hers, “Meet Me In The Middle”, is featured on the film’s official soundtrack.

The music video was released on September 11, 2014.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DAMM8JVbr8g

translation_songs.title: Jessie Ware – Say You Love Me (Traduction Française)

songs.lyrics:
32 ContributorsTranslationsFrançaisSay You Love Me Lyrics[Verse 1]
Say you love me to my face
I need it more than your embrace
Just say you want me, that's all it takes
Heart's gettin' torn from your mistakes

[Chorus]
'Cause I don't wanna fall in love if you don't wanna try
But all that I've been thinking of is maybe that you might
Baby it looks as though we're running out of words to say
And love's floatin' away
[Verse 2]
Just say you love me, just for today
And don't give me time cause that's not the same
I want to feel burning flames when you say my name
I want to feel passion flow into my bones like blood through my veins

[Chorus]
'Cause I don't wanna fall in love if you don't wanna try
But all that I've been thinking of is maybe that you might
Baby it looks as though we're running out of words to say
And love's floatin' away

[Bridge]
Won't you stay? Won't you stay?
Slowly, slowly you unfold me
But do you know me at all?
Someone told me love controls everything
But only if you know

[Bridge : Jessie Ware & Ed Sheeran]
'Cause I don't wanna fall in love
(No-no-no-no, no, no)
If you don't wanna try
(Just try sometimes)
But all that I've been thinking of
(I just think)
Is maybe that you might
(You might)
You might also like[Chorus]
'Cause I don't wanna fall in love
If you don't wanna try
But all that I've been thinking of
Is maybe that you might
And baby it looks as though we're running out of words to say
And love's floatin' away

[Outro]
Won't you stay?
Won't you stay40Embed

songs.title: Selfish Love
songs.embed_content: Read “Selfish Love” by Jessie Ware on Genius
songs.lyrics:
13 ContributorsSelfish Love Lyrics[Verse 1]
Baby let's be honest about this
There's only room for one in your heart
So tell me darlin', why are we like this?
I must admit that I kind of like it

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, you're acting sweet
I know what that means
All these games we play
Always end the same
[Chorus]
Selfish love, why do I do these things?
I break you down, just to get my way
Selfish love, darlin' you do it too
You tell me lies and I bend the truth
And I, I know
That I can't get enough
Selfish love

[Verse 2]
Baby now it feels like we're dancing
Dodging bullets, now ain't that romantic?
Take what I want, but you want me to take it
I only give love when I want to make it

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, you're acting sweet
I know what that means
All these games we play
Always end the same

[Chorus]
Selfish love, why do I do these things?
I break you down, just to get my way
Selfish love, darlin' you do it too
You tell me lies and I bend the truth
And I, I know
That I can't get enough
Selfish love
Selfish love
Selfish love
You might also like[Bridge]
Oh, you're acting sweet
And I know what that means
Selfish love
Oh, you're acting sweet

[Outro]
Selfish love
Selfish love

songs.title: Spotlight

description.plain:
Spotlight is the 3rd single that also acts as the opener on Jessie Ware’s 3rd and most recent album, What’s Your Pleasure?.

With her disco-era nostalgia ramping up due to the restrictions of the lockdown, this song teases listeners with this theme through her lustful lyrics expressed through her sultry vocals and dream-pop/dance-pop sound.

This single and the album itself has been loved by critics and fans alike; theneedledrop called it the 4th best song of the year and it came 6th place on r/music_survivor’s Song of the Year 2020.

body.plain:
Spotlight is the 3rd single that also acts as the opener on Jessie Ware’s 3rd and most recent album, What’s Your Pleasure?.

With her disco-era nostalgia ramping up due to the restrictions of the lockdown, this song teases listeners with this theme through her lustful lyrics expressed through her sultry vocals and dream-pop/dance-pop sound.

This single and the album itself has been loved by critics and fans alike; theneedledrop called it the 4th best song of the year and it came 6th place on r/music_survivor’s Song of the Year 2020.

(Ah, ah, ah)

I just wanna stay in the moonlight
This is our time, in the spotlight
